#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides gtk3theme #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Copy Adwaita theme for root $normal\n" mkdir -p /root/.config tar -C /usr/share/themes/Adwaita -cvf - gtk-3.0 gtk-2.0 | tar -C /root/.config -xf - ;; esac

#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors . /etc/lesslinux/branding/branding.en.sh
for i in /etc/xinitrc.d/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-*.?? ; do provides="` cat $i | grep '#lesslinux provides' | awk '{print $3}' `" if echo "$skipservices" | grep -q '|'$provides'|' ; then echo "Skipping $provides" else $i start fi done
# Set DPI value if [ -f /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb ] ; then xrdb -load /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb else mkdir -p /home/surfer/.lesslinux echo "Xft.dpi: ${dpi}" >> /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb xrdb -load /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb fi
# sed -i 's/29\.0\.1/31.0/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/010_firefox.desktop install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/010_firefox.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/020_thunderbird.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/torbrowser.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/"
# Uncomment to debug # /usr/bin/Terminal & # /usr/bin/xterm & # setxkbmap -rules xorg -model pc105 -layout "$xkbmap" # [ -f "${HOME}/Desktop/tarnmailer.desktop" ] || install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/tarnmailer.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop"
if [ -f "${HOME}/.mozilla/plugins/libflashplayer.so" ] ; then echo "Found Flash" else install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/flashinstall.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/flashinstall.desktop" fi
setxkbmap -layout "$xkbmap" esetroot -scale /etc/lesslinux/branding/desktop.jpg Thunar --daemon & xfsettingsd sleep 1 xfsettingsd --replace if xdpyinfo | grep -q -i composite ; then sed -i 's/fake transparency=true/fake transparency=false/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf compton --shadow-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' --fade-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' -cCGbf # xcompmgr -c & fi xbindkeys & xfdesktop & # icewm-session openbox & lxqt-panel shutdown-wrapper.sh

#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin: export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
# check, if the files needed exist - some of those directories are defaults of customers # and not used on normal LessLinux builds
for d in Data Runtime Software Programme Windows-Programme Programs Windows-Programs Lizenzen lizenzen licenses legal ; do [ -d /lesslinux/cdrom/${d} ] && tar -C /lesslinux/cdrom -cf - ${d} | tar -C /lesslinux/data -xf - done for f in liesmich.html readme.html LIESMICH.html README.html Start.exe Start.inf ; do [ -f /lesslinux/cdrom/${f} ] && tar -C /lesslinux/cdrom -cf - ${f} | tar -C /lesslinux/data -xf - done
